top_categories.workout_context: Muck n Mac Fest rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Muck n Mac Fest’s uk scotland, british gravel demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Racing Muck n Mac Fest isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Muck n Mac Fest when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Muck n Mac Fest. Make this intensity feel like home.
Muck n Mac Fest’s uk scotland gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Muck n Mac Fest — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
Muck n Mac Fest’s uk scotland gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
The varied gradients at Muck n Mac Fest reward climbing adaptability — knowing when to sit, when to stand, and when to switch.
Short, violent efforts are unavoidable at Muck n Mac Fest — climbs demanding 2-minute maximal efforts, surges to close gaps, attacks on uk scotland gravel.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Muck n Mac Fest — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.
Low-cadence force work builds the muscular strength for Muck n Mac Fest’s 3,500ft of climbing — especially the grinding, low-speed ascents.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Muck n Mac Fest’s 55 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Muck n Mac Fest requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on uk scotland gravel to build confidence. Expect: uk scotland, british gravel, uk.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Race Simulation to prepare you for 55 miles of uk scotland gravel in Traquair House, Scotland, UK.
